skills.name: Install kubectl
skills.pattern:
brew install kubectl
# or
curl -LO https://dl.k8s.io/release/$(curl -sL https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl

skills.name: Local Cluster
skills.pattern:
minikube start
minikube dashboard
# or kind
kind create cluster

skills.name: Pod
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  containers:
  - name: myapp
    image: myapp:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 3000

skills.name: Deployment
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: myapp
        image: myapp:latest

skills.name: Service
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: myapp-svc
spec:
  selector:
    app: myapp
  ports:
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 3000
  type: ClusterIP

skills.name: Ingress
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: myingress
spec:
  rules:
  - host: app.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: myapp-svc
            port:
              number: 80

skills.name: ConfigMap
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: myconfig
data:
  APP_ENV: production
  LOG_LEVEL: info

skills.name: Secret
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: mysecret
type: Opaque
data:
  password: cGFzc3dvcmQ=

skills.name: PVC
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: mypvc
spec:
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi

skills.name: Namespace
skills.pattern:
kubectl create namespace production
kubectl apply -f deploy.yaml -n production

skills.name: kubectl Basics
skills.pattern:
kubectl get pods
kubectl get deployments
kubectl get services
kubectl describe pod <name>
kubectl logs <pod>

skills.name: Apply
skills.pattern:
kubectl apply -f deploy.yaml
kubectl apply -f ./manifests/
kubectl delete -f deploy.yaml

skills.name: Execute
skills.pattern:
kubectl exec -it <pod> -- sh
kubectl exec <pod> -- ls -la

skills.name: Scale
skills.pattern: kubectl scale deployment myapp --replicas=5

skills.name: Rollout
skills.pattern:
kubectl rollout status deployment/myapp
kubectl rollout undo deployment/myapp
kubectl rollout restart deployment/myapp

skills.name: Probes
skills.pattern:
livenessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /health
    port: 3000
  initialDelaySeconds: 30
readinessProbe:
  httpGet:
    path: /ready
    port: 3000

skills.name: Resources
skills.pattern:
resources:
  requests:
    memory: '64Mi'
    cpu: '250m'
  limits:
    memory: '128Mi'
    cpu: '500m'

skills.name: Environment
skills.pattern:
env:
- name: NODE_ENV
  value: production
- name: DB_HOST
  valueFrom:
    configMapKeyRef:
      name: dbconfig
      key: host

skills.name: Job
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: migrate
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: migrate
        image: myapp
        command: ['npm', 'run', 'migrate']
      restartPolicy: Never

skills.name: CronJob
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: cleanup
spec:
  schedule: '0 0 * * *'
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - name: cleanup
            image: myapp
            command: ['npm', 'run', 'cleanup']
          restartPolicy: OnFailure

skills.name: StatefulSet
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: postgres
spec:
  serviceName: postgres
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres

skills.name: DaemonSet
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: fluentd
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: fluentd

skills.name: Autoscaling
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: myapp
  minReplicas: 2
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 80

skills.name: RBAC
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: Role
metadata:
  name: pod-reader
rules:
- apiGroups: ['']
  resources: ['pods']
  verbs: ['get', 'list']

skills.name: Helm
skills.pattern:
helm install myrelease bitnami/postgresql
helm upgrade myrelease ./mychart
helm uninstall myrelease

skills.name: Kustomize
skills.pattern:
apiVersion: kustomize.config.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: Kustomization
resources:
- deployment.yaml
images:
- name: myapp
  newTag: v2.0

skills.name: Port Forward
skills.pattern:
kubectl port-forward pod/myapp 3000:3000
kubectl port-forward svc/myservice 8080:80

skills.name: Debug
skills.pattern:
kubectl describe pod <name>
kubectl logs <pod> --previous
kubectl get events
kubectl top pods

skills.name: Context
skills.pattern:
kubectl config get-contexts
kubectl config use-context <name>
kubectl config set-context --current --namespace=prod

skills.name: Best Practices
